detectors.description:
PoolRewards.notifyRewardAmount(uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/VUSDC.sol#942-958) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	-rewardRate = reward.div(REWARD_DURATION) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/VUSDC.sol#945)
	-leftover = remaining.mul(rewardRate) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/VUSDC.sol#948)

	-[leftover = remaining.mul(rewardRate)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/VUSDC.sol#L948)
